Description: This template creates a Multi-AZ, multi-subnet VPC infrastructure with UIPath Orchestrator deployed in private Subnets, with an ALB behind a Route53 in public subnets

StorageBucket.default: Bucket to create for file storage

AvailabilityZones.Description: List of Availability Zones to use for the subnets in the VPC - maximum of 3 AZs are used for this deployment (logical order of your selections is preserved).

NumberOfAZs.Description: Number of Availability Zones to use in the VPC (upto 3), must match your selections in the list of Availability Zones parameter.

VPCCIDR.ConstraintDescription: CIDR block parameter must be in the form x.x.0.0/16
VPCCIDR.Description: CIDR block for the VPC, must be in the form x.x.0.0/16.

PrivateSubnetTag1.ConstraintDescription: tags must be in format "Key=Value" keys can only contain [a-zA-Z0-9+\-._:/@], values can contain [a-zA-Z0-9+\-._:/@ *\\"'\[\]\{\}]
PrivateSubnetTag1.Description: Tag to add to private subnet 1 in format Key=Value (Optional).

PrivateSubnetTag2.ConstraintDescription: tags must be in format "Key=Value" keys can only contain [a-zA-Z0-9+\-._:/@], values can contain [a-zA-Z0-9+\-._:/@ *\\"'\[\]\{\}]
PrivateSubnetTag2.Description: Tag to add to private subnet 2 in format Key=Value (Optional).

PrivateSubnetTag3.ConstraintDescription: tags must be in format "Key=Value" keys can only contain [a-zA-Z0-9+\-._:/@], values can contain [a-zA-Z0-9+\-._:/@ *\\"'\[\]\{\}]
PrivateSubnetTag3.Description: Tag to add to private subnet 3 in format Key=Value (Optional).

PublicSubnetTag1.ConstraintDescription: tags must be in format "Key=Value" keys can only contain [a-zA-Z0-9+\-._:/@], values can contain [a-zA-Z0-9+\-._:/@ *\\"'\[\]\{\}]
PublicSubnetTag1.Description: Tag to add to public subnet 1 in format Key=Value (Optional)

PublicSubnetTag2.ConstraintDescription: tags must be in format "Key=Value" keys can only contain [a-zA-Z0-9+\-._:/@], values can contain [a-zA-Z0-9+\-._:/@ *\\"'\[\]\{\}]
PublicSubnetTag2.Description: Tag to add to public subnet 2 in format Key=Value (Optional).

PublicSubnetTag3.ConstraintDescription: tags must be in format "Key=Value" keys can only contain [a-zA-Z0-9+\-._:/@], values can contain [a-zA-Z0-9+\-._:/@ *\\"'\[\]\{\}]
PublicSubnetTag3.Description: Tag to add to public subnet 3 in format Key=Value (Optional).

KeyPairName.Description: Existing Key Pair, which is to be used to Log in to VM instances.

InstanceType.ConstraintDescription: Class of instance, must be a valid EC2 instance type from the list.

StorageBucket.Description: S3 Bucket name storing UIPath files from Storage Gateway, should be a Valid S3 Bucket Name.
StorageBucket.ConstraintDescription: Bucket to be used to store files for syncing with gateway, should be a Valid S3 Bucket Name

GatewayName.Description: Name of S3 File Storage Gateway.

GatewayTimezone.Description: Timezone to choose for File Gateway

Domain.Description: The domain to use to host the project. This should already exist as a hosted zone in Route 53.

SubDomain.Description: Application subdomain under the parent domain where the delpoyed app would be accessible.

HAALicense.Description: license key, purchased from UIPath, to be used with optional High Availability Add-on.

RDSDBName.Description: Name for UIPath Database to be created.

RDSAllocatedStorage.Description: Storage amount to be allocated to RDS DB Instance.

RDSUsername.Description: Username to be used to log on to Database.

RDSPassword.Description: Password to be used to log on to Database.

OrchestratorVersion.Description: UIPath Orchestrator Version to be installed.

OrchestratorInstanceCount.Description: Desired Capacity (instance count) for Orchestrator instances.

OrchestratorLicense.Description: License key, purchased from UIPath, to be used with Orchestrator.

OrchestratorPassPhrase.Description: Orchestrator Passphrase in order to generate NuGet API keys, App encryption key and machine keys.

OrchestratorPassword.Description: Orchestrator Administrator password to login as.

AdminPassword.Description: Windows Administrator password to login as.

QSS3BucketName.ConstraintDescription: Quick Start bucket name can include numbers, lowercase letters, uppercase letters, and hyphens (-). It cannot start or end with a hyphen (-).
QSS3BucketName.Description: S3 bucket name hosting the Quickstart templates.

QSS3KeyPrefix.ConstraintDescription: Quick Start key prefix can include numbers, lowercase letters, uppercase letters, and hyphens (-).
QSS3KeyPrefix.Description: S3 key prefix under which Quick Start templates are hosted.

SecurityGroup.Description: Security Group allowing access to WindowsRM from anywhere

FileShareIAMRole.Description: IAM Role providing S3 Access to Storage Gateway

GatewayVMID1.Description: ID of Gateway VM in Public Subnet 1

GatewayVMPublicIP1.Description: Public IP of Gateway VM in Public Subnet 1

GatewayVMPrivateIP1.Description: Private IP of Gateway VM in Public Subnet 1

GatewayARN1.Description: ARN of Storage Gateway in Public Subnet 1

FileShareARN1.Description: ARN of S3 File Share in Public Subnet 1

HAMasterID.Description: ID of HA Master VM in Private Subnet 1

HAMasterPrivateIP.Description: Private IP of HA Master VM in Private Subnet 1

HASlave1ID.Description: ID of HA Slave 1 VM in Private Subnet 1

HASlave1PrivateIP.Description: Private IP of HA Slave 1 VM in Private Subnet 1

HASlave2ID.Description: ID of HA Slave 2 VM in Private Subnet 1

HASlave2PrivateIP.Description: Private IP of HA Slave 2 VM in Private Subnet 1

ScaleUpAutoScalingPolicy.Description: Auto scaling policy to scale up resources

ScaleDownAutoScalingPolicy.Description: Auto scaling policy to scale down resources

BastionHostID.Description: ID of BastionHost VM in Public Subnet 1

BastionHostPrivateIP.Description: Private IP of BastionHost in Public Subnet 1

BastionHostPublicIP.Description: Private IP of BastionHost in Public Subnet 1
